1227160.name: MENTAL
1227160.description:
IN-DEPTH STORY / 150+ SIDE MISSIONS / 4 GANG BASES TO DISMANTLE


Prepare to take-on rival gangs and take over the city under the guidance of the Prophet and your good ol' buddy Slade. Explore the unique & funny ways to earn money in MENTAL. Buy & upgrade new guns to rule the flow of "Carbide" within the city. There are 3 gangs that rule the city; The Reekers, Crimson Fang and The Union. Raid their bases and kill their bosses to dismantle the gangs. Also don't forget about the cops, they are always watching...


25 GUNS TO UNLOCK, UPGRADE & CUSTOMIZE

Fully interactive guns with their own set of attachments, challenges and skins. Buy new weapons or upgrade the ones you have to keep up with your enemies in MENTAL.

WALL RUN UP - WALL RUN SIDEWAYS - CLIMB WHATEVER MAKES SENSE

Explore every inch of the map with our all-new climbing and wall-run systems. Wall-run up or sideways with the push of a button and climb everything that makes sense. Infinitely combine these to achieve hardcore parkour!!!

HEADSHOTS = MORE SLO-MO

Slow down time with the press of a button to give yourself a much needed edge. Get headshots while in slow-motion to reset the timer and keep it going!

INFINITE POLICE WANTED LEVELS

Always watch out where and who you shoot, because the police will come after you! Run away to lose them or stand your ground and fight never ending waves of them.
1227160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
